chainvalidation_js.have_only_letters_digits_or_dashes: have only letters, digits, or dashes.
chainvalidation_js.have_only_one_dash_in_a_row: have only one dash in a row.
chainvalidation_js.end_with_a_letter_or_digit: end with a letter or digit.
chainvalidation_js.use_caution_sending_to_this_account: Use caution sending to this account.

register_jsx.enter_invite_code_optional: You also can use invite code, if you have it:
register_jsx.invite_new_account_will_receive: Account will have %(amount)s in Golos Power
register_jsx.account_name_hint: Account name can't be changed after registration.
register_jsx.sent_sms_descriptio: Дождитесь подтверждения вашего номера телефона (процесс может занять несколько минут), после чего поля регистрации станут активны для заполнения.
register_jsx.our_records_indicate_you_already_have_ac: Our records indicate that you already have %(APP_NAME)s account
register_jsx.in_order_to_prevent_abuse_APP_NAME_can_o: In order to prevent abuse %(APP_NAME)s can only register one account per verified user.

next_3_blocks.if_you_need_a_new_account: if you need a new account

register_jsx.before_creating_account: before you can create another account.
register_jsx.APP_NAME_can_only_register_one_account_p: Please note that %(APP_NAME)s can only register one account per verified user.
register_jsx.we_will_be_unable_to_create_account_with: We will be unable to create your %(APP_NAME)s account with this browser
register_jsx.couldnt_create_account_server_returned_e: Couldn't create account. Server returned the following error
register_jsx.form_requires_javascript_to_be_enabled: This form requires javascript to be enabled in your browser
register_jsx.examples: Enter number without country code, for example: 541-754-3010 | 89-636-48018
register_jsx.you_can_change_your_number: You can change your number at any time if we didn't receive your sms with verification code.
register_jsx.phone_number_has_been_verified: E-mail has been verified, please continue the registration.

invites_jsx.claim_wrong_secret_cannot_fetch: Cannot connect to server to check invite code

key_file.file_desc: There are private keys, which are authorizing your account. Store this file in secure place.
key_file.password_desc: Password (use it to log in on Golos):
key_file.posting_desc: Posting Key (also can be used as Golos password):

loginform_jsx.are_well_tested_and_known_to_work_with: are well tested and known to work with %(APP_DOMAIN)s.
loginform_jsx.No such account: Wrong account name. No such account.
loginform_jsx.posting_key_cannot_be_used: Key must be active, not posting
loginform_jsx.owner_key_cannot_be_used: Key must be active, not owner.
loginform_jsx.Cannot authorize: Cannot authorize on server. Contact us, please.
loginform_jsx.Cannot set authority: Cannot set authority on your account. Contact us, please.

mobilevalidation_js.enter_confirm_code: Confirmation code is sent to your e-mail. Please enter code below:
mobilevalidation_js.you_can_change_your_number: You can select another one e-mail.
mobilevalidation_js.waiting_from_you: Waiting SMS message with confirmation code %(code)s from your number to our verification number %(phone)s.
mobilevalidation_js.waiting_from_you_line_1: Please, send SMS with text %(code)s on %(phone)s
mobilevalidation_js.waiting_from_you_line_2: Golos.id interested in registration real people, not robots. We ask you to send SMS.
mobilevalidation_js.attempts_10: Confirmation was attempted a moment ago. You can try again only in 10 seconds
mobilevalidation_js.attempts_300: Confirmation was attempted a moment ago. You can try again only in 5 minutes

server_errors.too_many_requests: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
server_errors.registration_with_email_disabled: Registering with e-mail is temporarily disabled.
server_errors.email_already_used: This e-mail has already been used.
server_errors.socsite_already_used: Account with same social ID has already been registered.
server_errors.google_aliases_not_supported: GMail Alias (dots in e-mail) are forbidden.
server_errors.cannot_send_email: Cannot send e-mail. Please contact us and we will solve the problem.
server_errors.not_verified: Cannot register, not verified, or browser does not stores cookies.
server_errors.recaptcha_v2_failed: You didn't solved the "I'm not a robot" captcha.
server_errors.already_registered: Only one Golos account per user is allowed in order to prevent abuse.
server_errors.ip_account_rate_limit_LIMIT: Only one Golos account allowed per IP address every %(LIMIT)s min.
server_errors.no_such_invite: No such invite code. Please sure you are correctly typed its code.
server_errors.blockchain_not_available_for_invite: We sorry but blockchain is not available now. Wait a moment and try again, please.
server_errors.blockchain_not_available: We sorry but blockchain is not available now. Wait a moment and try again, please.
server_errors.cannot_find_owner_key_in_history: It looks like we cannot recover your account... Nobody has changed your password during latest 30 days. Did you just missing the password? In this case we cannot help...

oauth_main_jsx.title: GOLOS signer
oauth_main_jsx.apps_empty: You are not authorized in any app.
oauth_main_jsx.remove_authority: Forbid OAuth access to my account
oauth_main_jsx.remove_authority_confirm: Do you really want to forbid OAuth access to your account?

oauth_request.title: App authentication
oauth_request.application_requests_access_APP: That application requests access to your account
oauth_request.no_perms: No additional permissions need. Application will only know your username.
oauth_request.app_want_send_op: Application attempts to do the following actions. Click the arrow to show details.
oauth_request.posting_descr: Application can post, comment, vote, and store some its data in Golos blockchain.
oauth_request.posting_active_descr: Application also can use your active key, i.e. transfer tokens, etc. Only for 100%% trusted applications.
oauth_request.close_tab: Note: permissions can be used by applications only when a tab with application is opened.
oauth_request.app_not_exist_ID: Such application with ID %(ID)s is not registered. Contact us to register it.
oauth_request.pending_tx_expired: Transaction has expired - already sent or declined.

permissions.account_metadata: Store data required for its work
permissions.transfer_to_nonliq: Transferring funds to TIP or Golos Power
permissions.custom: Custom operations (need for storing app data in blockchain)
permissions.custom_active: Custom operations with active key (need for storing app data in blockchain)
permissions.transfer_from_tip: Transferring from your TIP-balance to your Golos Power
permissions.transfer_from_tip_to_others: Transferring from your TIP-balance to other accounts Golos Power
permissions.invite_claim_to_others: Claiming invite codes to other accounts
permissions.assets: Creating your own UIA assets and managing them
permissions.proposal_update_active: Voting in transaction proposals with active authorities

recovery.change_desc: Set trusted account which can be used to recovery access to your Golos account if someone will steal your keys/password and change it.
recovery.owner_key: Your current password or owner key
recovery.request_exists: Your request is received. Your recovery account will be
recovery.recover_desc: If you are not lost password or own key, but someone stolen it and changed your password, access to your account can be recovered.

recovery_step2_jsx.recover_fail: Unfortunately you cannot recovery access, because you was not set recovery account
recovery_step2_jsx.recover_will_send: Recovery request will be send to
recovery_step2_jsx.old_password_desc: In order to recover your account, we need your old password (or owner-key). If you changed password few times, you can use any of these passwords, if it is not older than 30 days.

recovery_step3_jsx.sent_desc: You sent request to your recovery account
recovery_step3_jsx.sent_desc2: Please wait until he/she will approve your request.
recovery_step3_jsx.sent_desc3: Add this page into browser bookmarks and check it periodically.
recovery_step3_jsx.sent_desc4: When request will be approved, you will be able to reset password and keys.
recovery_step3_jsx.retry_after: Retry of the request will be available
recovery_step3_jsx.can_retry: You can cancel request and try again later.
recovery_step3_jsx.approved: Request was approved! Recoverer should send to you a temporary recovery key. Enter it below:
recovery_step3_jsx.approved2: ...and also enter again your old password or owner-key:
recovery_step3_jsx.approved3: ...and then you will receive new password.
recovery_step3_jsx.last: Brilliant! There is only one step more, and your account is recovered! Just wait a bit, reload the page and we will change your password...
recovery_step3_jsx.last3: And still do not forget your temporary recovery key!
recovery_step3_jsx.reset: Almost done! It will be your new password:
recovery_step3_jsx.to_apply: In order to apply it, please enter your temporary key again...
recovery_step3_jsx.wrong_approve: Request approved, but there are some problems with approvement... You can cancel it and try again. Details:

recovery_review.title: Approve recovery
recovery_review.desc: requested you to recover their account.
recovery_review.desc2: You received their e-mail in the private messages. You can use it to contact with
recovery_review.desc3: and check that such request is sent really by this person, not some thief, which wants to stole the account.
recovery_review.tmp_owner: If you will approve request, when you will have to send this temporary key to the e-mail:
recovery_review.tmp_owner2: He/she can use this temporary key to reset keys and password.
recovery_review.tmp_owner3: And do not forget to mention what he/she should proceed recovery until
recovery_review.done: Done! Send the key to the e-mail

g.author: Author
g.blocked_from_blog: You are blocked by the author of this blog.

the_rules_of_APP_NAME.one: The first rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: Do not lose your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.second: The second rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: Do NOT lose your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.third: The third rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: We cannot recover your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.fourth: The fourth rule: If you can remember the password, it's not secure.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.fifth: The fifth rule: Use only randomly-generated passwords.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.sixth: The sixth rule: Do not tell anyone your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.seventh: The seventh rule: Always back up your password.

g.backup_password_by_storing_it: Back it up by storing in your password manager or a text file.
g.understand_that_we_cannot_recover_passwo: I understand that lost passwords cannot be recovered.
g.i_saved_password: I have securely saved my generated password
g.need_password_or_key: You need a private password or key (not a public key)
g.account_creation_succes: Your account has been successfully created!
g.password_update_succes: The password for %(accountName)s was successfully updated
g.however_you_can_use_it_to: However, you can use it to
g.hide_content: Information was not found or was hidden for violating the rules.
